1461091145786744840.tweet: During a visit with Hasten Hebrew Academy not only did therapy dogs Annie and Luciano get to host story time and teach students about what they do, the students made octopus toys for them! Thanks to Hasten Hebrew and the 3rd grade therapy animal research committee for inviting us  https://t.co/ny15bCyhZC
